text: avarkal veliyerrappattal, ivarkal avarkalutan veliyera mattarkal, melum, avarkalukketiraka por ceyyapperral, ivarkal avarkalukku utavi ceyyavum mattarkal, anriyum ivarkal avarkalukku utavi ceytalum, niccayamaka purumutuku kattip pin vanki vituvarkal - pinnar avarkal (ettakaiya) utaviyum alikkappata mattarkal
